problem_text_cn: 如图,小明用自制的直角三角形纸板DEF测量树AB的高度,测量时,使直角边DF保持水平状态,其延长线交AB于点G；使斜边DE所在的直线经过点A．测得边DF离地面的高度为1m,点D到AB的距离等于7.5m．已知DF=1.5m,EF=0.6m,那么树AB的高度等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, Xiaoming uses the self-made right-angled triangle cardboard DEF to measure the height of the tree AB. When measuring, keep the leg DF in a horizontal state, and its extended line intersects AB at point G; the measured height of side DF from the ground is N_0, and the distance from point D to AB is equal to N_1. Given that DF = N_2, EF = N_3, then the height of the tree AB is equal to ()
